Very often I think of the rich promises given us in the Word in regard 
                                                                           313
to God's keeping power. We are kept by His power. How reasonable then it is that we should be careful to walk in the footsteps of Jesus. He says, "I am the Light of the world: he that followeth Me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life" (John 8:12). Of those who walk in this light He declares, "Ye are the light of the world. . . . Let your light so shine before men, and glorify your Father which is in heaven" (Matthew 5:14, 16).
